## Commit Message Convention

Please ensure your commit messages follow the [Conventional Commits](https://www.conventionalcommits.org/) format:

- `fix:` for bug fixes
- `feat:` for new features
- `feat!:` or `BREAKING CHANGE:` for breaking changes
- `docs:` for documentation
- `refactor:` for code refactoring
- `perf:` for performance improvements
- `test:` for tests
- `chore:` for maintenance tasks

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the project's code style
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally
- [ ] My commit message follows the Conventional Commits format
- [ ] I have updated the documentation (if needed)
